activities: Community of on-line simulated car racers participating in on-line events.  Racers enter certain personal information in order to register and participate in events as well as to deposit and/or withdraw funds from their accounts.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customers' personal information entered On-Line, company related information available on our website(s)
